```lisp
; Corrected and standardized PDDL actions

(:action fold
  ; Combine actions related to folding to transform items
  :parameters (?npc - agent ?item - object)
  :precondition (and 
    (inventory ?npc ?item) 
    (or (rolled ?item) (cut ?item) (folded ?item))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (folded ?item)
    (not (rolled ?item))
    (not (cut ?item))
  )
)

(:action cut
  ; Cut an object and update its state
  :parameters (?npc - agent ?item - object)
  :precondition (and 
    (inventory ?npc ?item) 
    (modifiable ?item)
  )
  :effect (and 
    (cut ?item) 
    (not (modifiable ?item))
  )
)

(:action tape_ends
  ; Tape the ends of an item
  :parameters (?npc - agent ?tape - duct_tape ?ends - ends)
  :precondition (and 
    (half_folded ?tape) 
    (inventory ?npc ?tape)
  )
  :effect (and 
    (ends_taped ?tape ?ends) 
    (organization ?ends touching) 
    (form ?ends joined_together)
  )
)

(:action tape
  ; Tape an item to a target
  :parameters (?npc - agent ?item - object ?target - object)
  :precondition (and 
    (prepared ?item) 
    (inventory ?npc ?item)
  )
  :effect (and 
    (applied ?item ?target) 
    (organization ?target improved) 
    (status ?target modified)
  )
)
```

### Corrections Made:
- Standardized the type of `?npc` to `agent` across all actions for consistency.
- Removed unnecessary parameters: `?status_item` from the `fold` action and `?target` from the `cut` action as it was not used in the effect.
- Ensured logical consistency in preconditions and effects by adding missing negations and ensuring effects logically follow from preconditions.
- Unified the type for `?target` in the `tape` action to `object` for consistency.
